00026 //  Templated compressed sparse column matrix (Fortran conventions).
00027 //  uses 1-based offsets in storing row indices.
00028 //  Used primarily to interface with Fortran sparse matrix libaries.
00029 //  (CANNOT BE USED AS AN STL CONTAINER.)
00030 
00031 
00032 #ifndef FCSCMAT_H
00033 #define FCSCMAT_H
00034 
00035 #include <iostream>
00036 #include <cassert>
00037 #include "tnt/tnt.h"
00038 #include "tnt/vec.h"
00039 
00040 using namespace std;
00041 
00042 namespace TNT
00043 {
00044 
00045 template <class T>
00046 class Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix 
00047 {
00048 
00049    protected:
00050 
00051        Vector<T>           val_;       // data values (nz_ elements)
00052        Vector<Subscript>   rowind_;    // row_ind (nz_ elements)
00053        Vector<Subscript>   colptr_;    // col_ptr (n_+1 elements)
00054 
00055        int nz_;                   // number of nonzeros
00056        Subscript m_;              // global dimensions
00057        Subscript n_;
00058   
00059    public:
00060 
00061 
00062        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix(void);
00063        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix(const Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix<T> &S)
00064         : val_(S.val_), rowind_(S.rowind_), colptr_(S.colptr_), nz_(S.nz_),
00065             m_(S.m_), n_(S.n_) {};
00066        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix(Subscript M, Subscript N, 
00067             Subscript nz, const T  *val,  const Subscript *r, 
00068             const Subscript *c) : val_(nz, val), rowind_(nz, r), 
00069             colptr_(N+1, c), nz_(nz), m_(M), n_(N) {};
00070 
00071        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix(Subscript M, Subscript N, 
00072             Subscript nz, char *val,  char  *r, 
00073             char *c) : val_(nz, val), rowind_(nz, r), 
00074             colptr_(N+1, c), nz_(nz), m_(M), n_(N) {};
00075 
00076        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix(Subscript M, Subscript N, 
00077             Subscript nz, const T  *val, Subscript *r, Subscript *c)
00078             : val_(nz, val), rowind_(nz, r), colptr_(N+1, c), nz_(nz), 
00079                     m_(M), n_(N) {};
00080     
00081       ~Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix() {};
00082         
00083 
00084        T &      val(Subscript i) { return val_(i); }
00085        const T &      val(Subscript i) const { return val_(i); }
00086 
00087        Subscript &   row_ind(Subscript i) { return rowind_(i); }
00088        const Subscript &   row_ind(Subscript i) const { return rowind_(i); }
00089 
00090        Subscript    col_ptr(Subscript i) { return colptr_(i);}
00091        const Subscript    col_ptr(Subscript i) const { return colptr_(i);}
00092 
00093 
00094        Subscript    num_cols() const { return m_;}
00095        Subscript    num_rows() const { return n_; }
00096 
00097        Subscript          dim(Subscript i) const 
00098        {
00099 #ifdef TNT_BOUNDS_CHECK
00100             assert( 1 <= i );
00101             assert( i <= 2 );
00102 #endif
00103             if (i==1) return m_;
00104             else if (i==2) return m_;
00105             else return 0;
00106         }
00107 
00108        Subscript          num_nonzeros() const {return nz_;};
00109        Subscript          lbound() const {return 1;}
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix& operator=(const 
00114             Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix &C)
00115         {
00116             val_ = C.val_;
00117             rowind_ = C.rowind_;
00118             colptr_ = C.colptr_;
00119             nz_ = C.nz_;
00120             m_ = C.m_;
00121             n_ = C.n_;
00122 
00123             return *this;
00124         }
00125 
00126        Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix& newsize(Subscript M, Subscript N, 
00127                 Subscript nz)
00128         {
00129             val_.newsize(nz);
00130             rowind_.newsize(nz);
00131             colptr_.newsize(N+1);
00132             return *this;
00133         }
00134 };
00135 
00136 template <class T>
00137 ostream& operator<<(ostream &s, const Fortran_Sparse_Col_Matrix<T> &A)
00138 {
00139     Subscript M=A.num_rows();
00140     Subscript N=A.num_cols();
00141 
00142     s << M << " " << N << " " << A.num_nonzeros() <<  endl;
00143 
00144 
00145     for (Subscript k=1; k<=N; k++)
00146     {
00147         Subscript start = A.col_ptr(k);
00148         Subscript end = A.col_ptr(k+1);
00149 
00150         for (Subscript i= start; i<end; i++)
00151         {
00152             s << A.row_ind(i) << " " << k << " " << A.val(i) << endl;
00153         }
00154     }
00155 
00156     return s;
00157 }
00158 
00159 
00160 
00161 } // namespace TNT
00162 
00163 #endif  
00164 /* FCSCMAT_H */
